org.apache.ignite.ml.math.functions

Interface IgniteDifferentiableDoubleToDoubleFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DoubleFunction<Double>, IgniteDoubleFunction<Double>, Serializable

    public interface IgniteDifferentiableDoubleToDoubleFunction
extends IgniteDoubleFunction<Double>
    Interface for differentiable functions from double to double.
